title: Love of Labs: The Ultimate Tribute to Labrador Retrievers
features: There are few animals that are as lovable as a dog, and few dogs that are as lovable as a Lab. A first-class retriever with a loyal personality, gentle nature, and good looks to boot, Labs are faithful companions and assistants that bring us laughter, comfort, and courage.

Love of Labs is the ultimate tribute to these remarkable dogs, with captivating stories by leading outdoors writers complemented by delightful color photos. Stories like Bill Tarrant's "Of Miracle and Memories," which evokes the beauty of the relationship between an owner and his Lab as the owner faces the impending death of his longtime friend. Or James Herriot's tale of the lovable but awkward Lab, Brandy, whose classic Labrador antics will make you laugh.
No other book pays higher honor to the Lab than Love of Labs--it's sure to become a favorite of dog lovers nationwide.
Also recommended: Love of Goldens, Puppy Love.
description: "...a great tribute to this remarkable breed... Whether your favorite Lab is a hunting companion or just a family pet, you'll love this book." --
"The space between the text is occupied by a host of photos of this most popular of American dog breeds. It's a tossup as to whether the text complements the photos or the other way around." --
"This book pays homage to this popular breed, combining stories and articles with photos ...." --
St. Paul Pioneer Press, St. Paul, MN

Celebrate the world's most popular pets with the PetLife Library from Voyageur Press. This acclaimed series brings you treasured stories and insights from noted authors, along with stunning color photographs of your favorite pets.
